Topic.Title: Micheal Dell to take private before Win8 PC upgrade cycle

Message.Msg: Agreed. Goodwill is 6b, pretty high. I have iPad and iPhone but need a pc at work and home to get xls and biz related tasks done. Selling puts for 9.4 entry point right now. 3% div in third qtr at those levels.

Topic.Title: The young and Dumb investors are out of DELL

Message.Msg: "DELL is not going to $50 imo but a double or triple is good enough for me." Wait 5 years and Dell is going higher...but it takes time, let's wait.
Come on Dell! Have a little pride in the company. Announce some sort of expanded stock buy-back program. Announce a big one-time stock dividend. With the stock being this low you have some options!
It is probably worth $20, that's why.

Making that kind of money, how long before Dell could buy back all the shares not already owned by Micheal Dell himself? The current stock price is a bargain. Hope it doesn't take Wall Street too long to recognize it.

Topic.Title: Micheal Dell to take private before Win8 PC upgrade cycle

Message.Msg: " To be honest, I don't want to throw my money down at $10.75, watch it fall to $6, and then have Michael step in and buy the whole thing for $8." I read very often, that Dell has wasted a lot of shareholder value, because Dell bought back shares to high prices - in average. Your case, quite the opposite, but may be. It's a question of probability, I think

Message.Title: We should start to see a steady rise in stock price into Christmas. Enjoy longs!
Message.Msg: We might not be sexy but we make money. Enjoy your labor day weekend everybody!

Message.Title: Windows 8 crap shoot fund
Message.Msg: I bet these stocks outperform the market from now thru spring with WIndow 8 unfairly being treated like it is dead before it launches. Windows 8 will not be the next Vista because it runs on phones and tablets and it is not dog slow like Vista. These stocks will all benefit from Windows 8 and have cash and have been beaten to heck by computers IMO. There is normally a sell off this time of year from mid Sept to mid Oct but funds have to buy something during this time while most things sell off. In the old days they would buy APPL and QCOM during these kind of periods and MSFT and INTC would dive. Did you see AAPL, INTC and MSFT today ? Could Windows 8 be the outperformer theme during this rocky period ?

Topic.Title: We should start to see a steady rise in stock price into Christmas. Enjoy longs!

Message.Msg: I hope you're right. This stock is taking a beating lately. That's amazing for a profitable company. Soon enough Wall Street should recognize that Dell is oversold and undervalued at these levels. It wouldn't hurt to have the company step up the stock buy-back program!!

Topic.Title: We should start to see a steady rise in stock price into Christmas. Enjoy longs!

Message.Msg: we need some forward guidance so that this baby could rock and roll... strange that nothing positive is being said by analysts ??? it seems that these NAYSAYERS have their own agenda, and, IMVHO, I feel that the DELL stock is being manipulated... hedge funds have a large SHORT position, and it only takes a few " promises " to get some analysts to try their hand at bringing the stock price downward ... all IMVHO ... I may be wrong... but ...
